title: Mini potato and chorizo quiches
ingredients: ['2 teaspoons olive oil', '120g Spanish chorizo sausage, finely diced', '1 potato, peeled and finely diced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '75g grated Manchego cheese, divided', '8 large eggs', '1 pinch cayenne pepper, or more to taste', '1/2 teaspoon salt']
